General.Name: Formosa Ingredient Factory PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk produces and sells tapioca pearl products, jelly toppings, popping boba, premium sauce, syrup products, and premix powder in Indonesia and internationally. It produces its products under the Boba King brand. PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Berlian 88 Biz Estate Blok C No.1, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15810

AddressData.Street: Berlian 88 Biz Estate Blok C No.1
